flavor: Run wyld.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1 credit and draw 1 card.
text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.
title: René "Loup" Arcemont: Party Animal

flavor: They can buy off union leadership, but they can't stop us walking out!
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following of the Corp's choice:  Gain 6 credits.  Draw 4 cards.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following of the Corp's choice:
• Gain 6[credit].
• Draw 4 cards.
title: Wildcat Strike

flavor:
"It hungers to sink teeth into problems."
—Loup
stripped_text: +1 mu Access Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Access– Trash 2 cards from your grip: Trash the card you are accessing. Use this ability only once per turn. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Carnivore

flavor: Was it something you ate?
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Hosted virus counter: Break 1 subroutine on host ice.
title: Botulus

flavor:
"There's a tension to a cook. Each processing cycle sweetens the pot and raises the heat. I stir all night, but few have my appetite for danger."
—René "Loup" Arcemont
stripped_text: When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. click, trash: Gain 2 credits for each hosted virus counter.
text:
When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program.
[click], [trash]: Gain 2[credit] for each hosted virus counter.
title: Fermenter

flavor: The greediest bloodsucker this side of a corporate boardroom.
stripped_text: Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program. Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.
text:
Whenever you make a successful run on a central server, place 1 virus counter on this program.
Hosted virus counter: The ice you are encountering gets -1 strength for the remainder of this encounter.
title: Leech

flavor:
"It waits on an unlabelled memstrip far below the deepest hab. Angry, desperate souls seek it out, hungry for power to change a brutal world. Once they can stomach no more bitter revenge, they return to that nameless tunnel, the book a recipe thicker."
—Heinlein urban legend
stripped_text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
text: Whenever you install a virus program, you may place 1 virus counter on it.
title: Cookbook

flavor: I obtain your desire.
stripped_text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1 credit for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: Whenever a run on HQ or R&D ends, you may gain 1[credit] for each time you accessed a card during that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Zahya Sadeghi: Versatile Smuggler

flavor: The real reward is the friends you make along the way.
stripped_text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker program and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install it. Otherwise, add it to your grip.
text: Search your stack for 1 icebreaker program and reveal it. (Shuffle your stack after searching it.) If you made a successful run this turn, you may install it. Otherwise, add it to your grip.
title: Mutual Favor

flavor:
"A mirrorfiber mod or high-end mantle can be helpful, but nothing beats a good dose of 'keeping your damn head down.'"
—"G0ph3r" O'Ryan
stripped_text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3 credits.
text: Run any server. During that run, the rez cost of each piece of ice is increased by 3[credit].
title: Tread Lightly

flavor: Zahya knows the keeper of every door between the Docklands and the Domes. More importantly, she knows their price.
stripped_text: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
text: The first time each turn you breach HQ, access 1 additional card.
title: Docklands Pass

flavor: "Braggarts chase big heists. Patience enriches skimming fractions of a credit at a time." —Zahya
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever you make a successful run, place 1 credit on this hardware. click: Place 1 credit on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever you make a successful run, place 1[credit] on this hardware. [click]: Place 1[credit] on this hardware, then take all credits from it. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Pennyshaver

flavor: Shhhh. It's naptime.
stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
text:
Install only on a piece of ice.
When you install this program and when your turn begins, place 1 virus counter on this program. Then, if there are 3 or more hosted virus counters, derez host ice.
title: Tranquilizer

flavor: The Domes of Heinlein are a pressure cooker of cutthroat capitalism. Prospective employers rarely have time for background checks.
stripped_text: When you install this resource, load 12 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it. click: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3 credits from this resource.
text:
When you install this resource, load 12[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it.
[click]: Run a central server you have not run this turn. If successful, take 3[credit] from this resource.
title: Red Team

flavor: Sufficient skill is indistinguishable from magic.
stripped_text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
text: Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, you may swap 2 installed pieces of ice.
title: Tāo Salonga: Telepresence Magician

flavor: The challenge of my art is what I live for, but I'm not going to say no to a patron with taste.
stripped_text: Gain 5 credits. If you have any click remaining, lose click.
text: Gain 5[credit]. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
title: Creative Commission

flavor:
“You know there's no water in the Sea of Tranquility, right?”
“That doesn't mean there's no beach.”
stripped_text: Draw 4 cards. If you have any click remaining, lose click.
text: Draw 4 cards. If you have any [click] remaining, lose [click].
title: VRcation

flavor: Tāo exhaled, the med-exoskeleton faithfully stabilizing him. In that absent breath, he reached through layers of waldos and optimizers and plucked the errant molecule from the chip.
stripped_text: +1 mu The first program you install each turn costs 1 credit less to install.
text:
+1[mu]
The first program you install each turn costs 1[credit] less to install.
title: DZMZ Optimizer

flavor:
"With this beautiful baby I can juggle simultaneous runs by haptic feedback alone!"
—Tāo
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1 credit. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, gain 1[credit]. Then, you may install 1 card from your grip. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Pantograph

flavor:
A dabbling with truth is a pernicious dream
Drink deep, or taste not the raw datastream.
stripped_text: Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program. click: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
text:
Whenever a successful run on R&D ends, you may place 1 virus counter on this program.
[click]: Run R&D. If successful, access X additional cards when you breach R&D. X is equal to the number of hosted virus counters.
title: Conduit

flavor:
"We'll take the access codes from their own prisec—privilege escalation through local application of force."
—The Catalyst
stripped_text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card. When you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
text: Run HQ or R&D. If successful, draw 1 card. When you breach the attacked server, access 1 additional card.
title: Jailbreak

flavor: "After 381FS4 started acting independently, all bets were off. Rethreading its own brain chip… even probing our nodes. I had to shut it down." —Linus Lovegood, NBN Novelties&Acquisitions
stripped_text: Place 5 credits on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
text: Place 5[credit] on this event, then run any server. You can spend hosted credits during that run.
title: Overclock

flavor: Anyone can put in the hours of planning, practice, and preparation—but making it all look like luck takes style.
stripped_text: Gain 9 credits.
text: Gain 9[credit].
title: Sure Gamble

flavor: Compiling even the smallest AI takes weeks for only seconds of runtime, but that brief, shining moment allows… everything.
stripped_text: Interface 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program. 1 credit: +1 strength.
text:
Interface– 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine. When this run ends, trash this program.
1[credit]: +1 strength.
title: Mayfly

flavor: Not an Atom Misplaced.
stripped_text: You get +1 maximum hand size. Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
text:
You get +1 maximum hand size.
Whenever you score an agenda, you may add 1 card from Archives to HQ.
title: Haas-Bioroid: Precision Design

flavor: We are the light of tomorrow.
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, gain click click click. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn. Limit 1 per deck.
text:
When you score this agenda, gain [click][click][click]. You cannot score agendas for the remainder of the turn.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: Luminal Transubstantiation

flavor: Haas thinks they're making a new line of androgynous products. In truth, they're making us thousands of new siblings to free.
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, load 9 credits onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card. When your turn begins, take 3 credits from this asset.
text:
When you rez this asset, load 9[credit] onto it. When it is empty, trash it and draw 1 card.
When your turn begins, take 3[credit] from this asset.
title: Nico Campaign

flavor: The first lesson for handling bioroids is simple: they must not be allowed to feel.
stripped_text: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you did not install this turn.
text: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you did not install this turn.
title: Seamless Launch

flavor: All time is crunch time.
stripped_text: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D.
text: Draw 3 cards. Shuffle 2 cards from HQ into R&D.
title: Sprint

flavor:
"Whose memory-tape needs such stringent security?"
—The Catalyst
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, end the run unless they either spend click click or pay 5 credits.
text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, end the run unless they either spend [click][click] or pay 5[credit].
title: Manegarm Skunkworks

flavor: An End to Suffering.
stripped_text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1 credit.
text: When your discard phase ends, if there is a facedown card in Archives, gain 1[credit].
title: Jinteki: Restoring Humanity

flavor: We make you anew.
stripped_text: When you score this agenda, trash any number of cards from HQ. Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D. Limit 1 per deck.
text:
When you score this agenda, trash any number of cards from HQ. Shuffle up to 3 cards from Archives into R&D.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: Longevity Serum

flavor: A novel spin-off of Chronos tech was admixing sensitive data with ethically-sourced brain images of injured staff. Few intruders can handle a thousand years of skin burns in one moment.
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.
text:
You can advance this asset.
When the Runner accesses this asset while it is installed, do 2 net damage plus 1 net damage for each hosted advancement counter.
title: Urtica Cipher

flavor: You did not escape, you were shown mercy.
stripped_text: Subroutine Do 2 net damage. The Runner may jack out. Subroutine Do 2 net damage.
text:
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage. The Runner may jack out.
[subroutine] Do 2 net damage.
title: Karunā

flavor:
"Constant self-reflection is the key to excellence. We remember failed ideas, but do not carry them forward."
—Director Kase, unknown leadership seminar
stripped_text: Gain 10 credits. If there are any cards in HQ, trash 1 of them.
text: Gain 10[credit]. If there are any cards in HQ, trash 1 of them.
title: Hansei Review

flavor: Macroscale developments within the Net decouple the prior informational states—surplus entropy is then gifted where it will do the most good.
stripped_text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
text: Do X net damage, where X is equal to the sum of the printed agenda points on agendas you scored this turn.
title: Neurospike

flavor:
The self-evolving Net twists into spaces unthought and unthinkable: realms of gods and other infohazards, mocking our sacrifices to petty causality.
—Conceptual Frameworks for Applied Theology
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2 credits and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
text: Whenever the Runner approaches this server, you may pay 2[credit] and trash 2 cards from HQ. If you do, end the run.
title: Anoetic Void

flavor: Why Settle for Real?
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2 credits or draw 2 cards.
text: The first time each turn the Runner takes a tag, gain 2[credit] or draw 2 cards.
title: NBN: Reality Plus

flavor: We don't find news. We make it.
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag. Limit 1 per deck.
text:
When this agenda is scored or stolen, give the Runner 1 tag.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: Tomorrow's Headline

flavor: "It's worse than dead meat—your project is too toxic to even feed to the vultures! If you don't want to join it in the bloody memory hole, crawl onto every business show you can and wallow in blame like a pig in muck."
stripped_text: When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards. Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.
text:
When you rez this asset, draw 2 cards.
Remove this asset from the game: Shuffle up to 2 cards from Archives into R&D.
title: Spin Doctor

flavor: For the best augmented reality shopping experience, please disable tracking protection.
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following. If the Runner is tagged, you may resolve both instead.  Gain 3 credits.  Draw 3 cards.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following. If the Runner is tagged, you may resolve both instead.
• Gain 3[credit].
• Draw 3 cards.
title: Predictive Planogram

flavor: "A runner uses significant resources scrubbing their traces. Every cycle, it's harder to pin them down. But the game changes. In Heinlein, no one can last a day without brushing our AR-network." —Cassie LaRosa, Lunar NetDefense Sysop
stripped_text: Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn. Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8 credits.
text:
Play only if the Runner made a successful run during their last turn.
Give the Runner 1 tag unless they pay 8[credit].
title: Public Trail

flavor: Free commemorative souvenir!

text: Persistent– Whenever a run on this server ends, if the Runner stole any agendas during that run, give the Runner 2 tags. (If the Runner trashes this card while accessing it, this ability still applies for the remainder of this run.)
title: AMAZE Amusements

flavor: Here to Stay.

text: Whenever you advance a card, gain 2[credit] if it had no advancement counters.

flavor: We are judge, jury, and executioner.

text:
When you score this agenda, you may trash 1 installed resource.
Limit 1 per deck.
title: Above the Law

flavor:
"First rule of the business: make sure you're not 'personally liable' when the transaction executes."
—Ted J. Son, Central Counterparty Clearance
stripped_text: You can advance this asset. When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 1 meat damage for each hosted advancement counter.
text:
You can advance this asset.
When your turn begins, you may trash this asset to do 1 meat damage for each hosted advancement counter.
title: Clearinghouse

flavor: Did you really think you'd get away with it?

text:
Play only if the Runner is tagged.
Trash 1 installed program or piece of hardware.
title: Retribution

flavor: Sunlight does not touch the Crater of Eternal Darkness, a fitting abode for the Consortium's malefic secrets.
stripped_text: Whenever you score an agenda from this server, you may search R&D for 1 non-agenda card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ.
text: Whenever you score an agenda from this server, you may search R&D for 1 non-agenda card and reveal it. (Shuffle R&D after searching it.) Add that card to HQ.
title: Malapert Data Vault

flavor: Mobsters bribe police, megacorps acquire militaries.

text: When you score this agenda, if the Runner is tagged, do 4 meat damage; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
title: Orbital Superiority

flavor: With Earth-Luna communications, saving microseconds returns megacredits.

text:
When you score this agenda, you may draw 2 cards.
You get +2 maximum hand size.
title: Superconducting Hub

flavor: A financial instrument for diverting money from those outside to those inside.

text: Gain 9[credit].
title: Hedge Fund

flavor: Are you ready to start something big?
title: The Catalyst: Convention Breaker

flavor: You work for us. You just don't know it yet.
title: The Syndicate: Profit over Principle
